Projects.name: PsichoMATCH
summary: PsichoMatch is an innovative platform designed for scheduling psychological consultations, facilitating meaningful connections between patients and psychologists. This project, which integrates psychology with technology, offers users a unique experience in discovering psychological profiles and finding compatibilities.

With a user-friendly and functional interface, PsichoMatch allows users to explore profiles and find affinities based on psychological compatibility. Our goal is to foster strong and trustworthy professional relationships.

This project was developed as a team effort and represented a very special experience, as it was my first collaborative project with other tech professionals. This collaboration significantly boosted my professional career.
